chargeHist.descr: Failure to Describe Work/Products in Home Improvement Contract

result.execSummary:
The defendant Thomas L Handeland was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Contract Req'mts - Changes in Writing, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes ATCP110.05(1)(a).
  • Failure to Describe Work/Products in Home Improvement Contract, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes ATCP110.05(2)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: To be paid at rate of $100.00 per month commencing November 15, 2014 or penalty of 18 days Huber for non-payment.
Fine to be paid through payment plan listed for Count 2 or penalty of 18 days Huber for non-payment.

Defendant Thomas L Handeland in court with attorney Jeremy J. Guza.  Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Prosecuting attorney moves to strike the enhancers on Counts 2 and 3.  Court grants motion.  Enhancers struck from Counts 2 and 3.    Defendant enters a guilty plea to Counts 2 and 3.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Counts 1 and 4 dismissed and read in.  

Court orders the following: 

Count 2:
- Fine totaling: $883.00 to be paid at rate of $100.00 per month commencing November 15, 2014; alternate 18 days Huber

Count 3:
- Fine totaling: $883.00 to be paid through payment plan listed for Count 2; alternate 18 days Huber
